forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
